articles.title: Coronavirus: What's happening in Canada and around the world on Sunday - CBC.ca
articles.description: In Europe, Belgian police used water cannon and tear gas on Sunday to disperse some rowdy protesters in Brussels after most demonstrators marched peacefully to protest tightened COVID-19 restrictions that aim to counter a surge of coronavirus infections.
articles.content:

articles.title: Pope chides Europe, comforts migrants on return to Lesbos - Fox News
articles.description: Pope Francis returned Sunday to the Greek island of Lesbos to offer comfort to migrants at a refugee camp and blast what he said was Europe's indifference and self-interest “that condemns to death those on the fringes.”
